speaker: President.
english: President. Before the Commissioner takes the floor, I will ask once more if there are perhaps any other questions that she might be able to help answer.
original: President. Before the Commissioner takes the floor, I will ask once more if there are perhaps any other questions that she might be able to help answer.
agenda_item: Draft general budget for 2007, amended by the Council (all sections) – Financial Regulation applicable to the general budget of the European Communities – Draft amending budget No 6/2006 (debate)
